sig_info: The Weakness Passive from the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak is reduced to 30 to 5% and becomes a Debuff instead.
Attacks have a 1.5 to 3% chance per Unstoppable Buff to Nullify a Buff from the Opponent.

CRIMSON GEM OF CYTTORAK: Juggernaut starts the fight with the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak active.
The Crimson Gem of Cyttorak is disabled if Juggernaut suffers a non-damaging Debuff or is knocked down. While the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak is disabled, Juggernaut suffers a 50% Weakness Passive.
While the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak is active, Juggernaut is empowered and gains the following:
1. +42 Attack Rating.
2. +25% Damage Reduction.
3. Immunity to Reversed Controls.
UNSTOPPABLE BUFFS - MAX STACKS: 10: Juggernaut can only activate his Unstoppable Buffs if the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak is active.
Juggernaut gains 1 Unstoppable Buff each time he moves forward or lands an attack, but loses 1 Unstoppable Buff each time he is struck, enters block, or blocks an attack.
Unstoppable Buffs decrease by 1 every 1.25 seconds. This timer is reset each time an Unstoppable Buff is added or removed, or when Juggernaut Dodges backwards.
Each Unstoppable Buff provides the following:
1. +8.4 Attack Rating.
2. Increases Power Rate by 2.50%.
3. Lowers the opponent's chance to trigger Stun Debuffs by 20%. If this ability prevents a Stun Debuff from triggering, Juggernaut loses 7 Unstoppable Buffs.
MAXIMUM MOMENTUM: While Juggernaut has 10 Unstoppable Buffs, he gains an Unblockable Passive making his next blocked attack Unblockable at the cost of 10 Unstoppable Buffs.

After landing a Maximum Momentum Unblockable attack, Juggernaut is unable to gain his Unstoppable Buffs for 7 seconds, and places a Wither Debuff on the Opponent reducing their Power Rate by 50% for 10 seconds.
HEAVY ATTACKS: 100% chance to Stagger the Opponent for 8 seconds. The next time a Staggered Opponent triggers a Buff, that Buff and all other Buffs triggered at the same time will be immediately Nullified.
If the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak is active, inflict an additional Stagger.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Activate the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak if it is disabled.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Gain an Energize Buff for 10 seconds, granting 25% increased Combat Power Rate.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Each hit deals a burst of 42 Physical damage.
While at Maximum Momentum, 100% chance to gain a Fury Buff granting +168 Attack Rating for 10 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: When activated, the Crimson Gem of Cyrrotak cannot be removed for 20 seconds.
While at Maximum Momentum, inflict a Stun Debuff on the Opponent for 4 seconds.

2. Increases Power Rate by 2.50%.
3. Lowers the opponent's chance to trigger Stun Debuffs by 20%. If this ability prevents a Stun Debuff from triggering, Juggernaut loses 7 Unstoppable Buffs.

SPECIAL ATTACK 3: When activated, the Crimson Gem of Cyrrotak cannot be removed for 20 seconds.
While at Maximum Momentum, inflict a Stun Debuff on the Opponent for 4 seconds.

SPECIAL ATTACKS: Activate the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak if it is disabled.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Gain an Energize Buff for 10 seconds, granting 25% increased Combat Power Rate.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Each hit deals a burst of 438.5 Physical damage.
While at Maximum Momentum, 100% chance to gain a Fury Buff granting +1754 Attack Rating for 10 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: When activated, the Crimson Gem of Cyrrotak cannot be removed for 20 seconds.
While at Maximum Momentum, inflict a Stun Debuff on the Opponent for 4 seconds.

sig_info: The Weakness Passive from the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak is reduced to 30 to 5% and becomes a Debuff instead.
Attacks have a 1.5 to 3% chance per Unstoppable Buff to Nullify a Buff from the Opponent.

CRIMSON GEM OF CYTTORAK: Juggernaut starts the fight with the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak active.
The Crimson Gem of Cyttorak is disabled if Juggernaut suffers a non-damaging Debuff or is knocked down. While the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak is disabled, Juggernaut suffers a 50% Weakness Passive.
While the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak is active, Juggernaut is empowered and gains the following:
1. +585.5 Attack Rating.
2. +25% Damage Reduction.
3. Immunity to Reversed Controls.
UNSTOPPABLE BUFFS - MAX STACKS: 10: Juggernaut can only activate his Unstoppable Buffs if the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak is active.
Juggernaut gains 1 Unstoppable Buff each time he moves forward or lands an attack, but loses 1 Unstoppable Buff each time he is struck, enters block, or blocks an attack.
Unstoppable Buffs decrease by 1 every 1.25 seconds. This timer is reset each time an Unstoppable Buff is added or removed, or when Juggernaut Dodges backwards.
Each Unstoppable Buff provides the following:
1. +117.1 Attack Rating.
2. Increases Power Rate by 2.50%.
3. Lowers the opponent's chance to trigger Stun Debuffs by 20%. If this ability prevents a Stun Debuff from triggering, Juggernaut loses 7 Unstoppable Buffs.
MAXIMUM MOMENTUM: While Juggernaut has 10 Unstoppable Buffs, he gains an Unblockable Passive making his next blocked attack Unblockable at the cost of 10 Unstoppable Buffs.

After landing a Maximum Momentum Unblockable attack, Juggernaut is unable to gain his Unstoppable Buffs for 7 seconds, and places a Wither Debuff on the Opponent reducing their Power Rate by 50% for 10 seconds.
HEAVY ATTACKS: 100% chance to Stagger the Opponent for 8 seconds. The next time a Staggered Opponent triggers a Buff, that Buff and all other Buffs triggered at the same time will be immediately Nullified.
If the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak is active, inflict an additional Stagger.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Activate the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak if it is disabled.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Gain an Energize Buff for 10 seconds, granting 25% increased Combat Power Rate.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Each hit deals a burst of 585.5 Physical damage.
While at Maximum Momentum, 100% chance to gain a Fury Buff granting +2342 Attack Rating for 10 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: When activated, the Crimson Gem of Cyrrotak cannot be removed for 20 seconds.
While at Maximum Momentum, inflict a Stun Debuff on the Opponent for 4 seconds.

sig_info: The Weakness Passive from the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak is reduced to 30 to 5% and becomes a Debuff instead.
Attacks have a 1.5 to 3% chance per Unstoppable Buff to Nullify a Buff from the Opponent.
